classes.title: Basics of Websites
classes.subTitle: Learn how to create and host a website
classes.description: In this class we will use the Raspberry Pi Pico W to create and host a website following this tutorial: Getting started with your Raspberry Pi Pico W.
notes: Here is an online hex editor that lets you see how text is actually stored on a computer. Text files are what all websites and programs are built from.

classes.title: Build Your Website
classes.subTitle: Work together on our websites
classes.description: We'll continue to work through the official Raspberry Pi Pico W tutorial: Getting started with your Raspberry Pi Pico W.

classes.title: Share Your Website
classes.subTitle: View each other's sites on the network
classes.description: You will get a chance to share your work with the class.

classes.title: Basics of Game Development
classes.subTitle: Start from Scratch
classes.description: We'll learn the basics of game design using these Scratch tutorials. (Click 'Tutorials' at the top for additional tutorials.)

classes.title: Build Your Game
classes.subTitle: Moving from Scratch to Python
classes.description: We'll build some games using Pytch which lets us move from programming with blocks (Scratch) to programming with code (Python).

classes.title: Share Your Game
classes.subTitle: See and play each other's games
classes.description: You will get a chance to share your work with the class.

classes.title: Basics of Databases
classes.subTitle: Introduction to database concepts
classes.description: We will use the SQL Zoo tutorials to get hands-on practice with databases.
notes: Tony Saro builds his own database from scratch in this video.

classes.title: Build Your Database
classes.subTitle: Using SQL to Build a Database
classes.description: We will look at the MySQL Online Compiler so we can write our own database online.

classes.title: Share Your Database
classes.subTitle: Explain the database you've built
classes.description: You will get a chance to share your work with the class.

classes.title: Basics of Electronics
classes.subTitle: Overview of electronics
classes.description: Electronics starts with electrons. To understand electrons, we will build an atom, see actual atoms under an electron microscope, learn about electron charges and fields, see how electrons move inside metal, build some basic circuits, and possible dive into how those circuits work in detail.

classes.title: Basics of CPUs
classes.subTitle: The Central Processing Unit (CPU)
classes.description: The CPU is like the brain of the computer. We will explore simulations of how it works including the Scott CPU Simulation, a 6502 Simulator (the CPU used in the original Nintendo), and an Arm1 CPU Simulator (the ARM is a type of CPU used in mobile devices).

classes.title: Basics of Code in Biology
classes.subTitle: Exploring God's creativity
classes.description: We will look at the remarkable world of DNA and the cell with a Montage of DNA Animations, the Immune System, a Malaria Animation, and the ATP / Electron Transport Chain (Short).

classes.title: Basics of Robotics
classes.subTitle: Controlling a simple robot
classes.description: We'll use the Rocksi Robot Simulator to learn how to control a robot.

classes.title: Build Your Robot
classes.subTitle: Programming fundamentals for robotics
classes.description: Understand the basics of programming robots, including sensors, actuators, and control systems.

classes.title: Share Your Robot
classes.subTitle: Show off the robot you've built
classes.description: You will get a chance to share your work with the class.

classes.title: Basics of 3D Animation
classes.subTitle: Basics of 3D animation
classes.description: Learn the basic concepts of 3D animation, including keyframing and rigging.

classes.title: Build Your 3D Animation
classes.subTitle: Techniques for creating 3D models
classes.description: Explore techniques for creating detailed 3D models using software like Blender. You can also find free 3D characters and animations on Mixamo and explore more models on Sketchfab.

classes.title: Share Your 3D Animation
classes.subTitle: Show the class your 3D animation
classes.description: You will get a chance to share your work with the class.

classes.title: Basics of 3D Printing
classes.subTitle: Introduction to 3D printing
classes.description: We'll use Tinkercad to learn the basics of designing objects for 3D printing.

classes.title: Build Your 3D Creation
classes.subTitle: Design principles for 3D printing
classes.description: Understand the principles of designing 3D models specifically for 3D printing.

classes.title: Share Your 3D Creation
classes.subTitle: Show off what you've built
classes.description: You will get a chance to share your work with the class.

classes.title: Basics of AI
classes.subTitle: Basics of artificial intelligence
classes.description: Learn the fundamental concepts of artificial intelligence, including machine learning and neural networks. Explore Google's Teachable Machine and IBM's Machine Learning for Kids (a good basic example is under 'Project Templates' by searching 'Hand gestures').

classes.title: Build Your AI
classes.subTitle: Introduction to machine learning
classes.description: Understand the basics of machine learning, including supervised and unsupervised learning.

classes.title: Share Your AI
classes.subTitle: Show off what you've built
classes.description: You will get a chance to share your work with the class.

classes.title: Working on a Team
classes.subTitle: Collaboration in tech teams
classes.description: Learn about collaboration and communication in technology teams, including tools and best practices.

classes.title: Working in the Cloud
classes.subTitle: Common tools in tech industry
classes.description: Explore the common tools and software used in the technology industry.

classes.title: Starting a Career in Tech
classes.subTitle: Teams will share what they've built
classes.description: You will get a chance to share your work with the class.

classes.title: Basics of Capstone Projects
classes.subTitle: Planning your capstone project
classes.description: Learn how to plan and organize a capstone project, including defining objectives and creating a timeline.

classes.title: Build Your Capstone Project
classes.subTitle: Executing your project plan
classes.description: Work on the development and implementation of your capstone project according to the plan.

classes.title: Share Your Capstone Project
classes.subTitle: Show off your final project
classes.description: You will get a chance to share your work with the class.
